text:
Hey, are we still on for the math study group tomorrow? Btw, here is my schedule. Is there any class we can go together?
Here's his schedule: Monday - Math in Room 101 at 9:00 AM, Science in Lab 204 at 10:30 AM; Tuesday - English in Room 102 at 9:00 AM, History in Room 201 at 10:30 AM; Wednesday - Art in Studio 5 at 9:00 AM, Physical Education in the Gym at 10:30 AM; Thursday - Music in Room 301 at 9:00 AM, Geography in Room 202 at 10:30 AM; Friday - Drama in Theater 2 at 9:00 AM, Computer Science in Lab 305 at 10:30 AM.
